summary: Provincial Vika travels by train to St. Petersburg, where she meets a scientific employee of the Kunstkammer - Lisa. Lisa invites her temporarily stay at her home. Vicka will turn the life of Lisa into a series of endless parties.
cast: Anna Mikhalkova|Yana Troyanova|Anna Parmas|Yulia Snigir|Konstantin Shelestun|Evgeniy Muravich|Lyubov Arkus|Sergey Borisov|Tatyana Ryabokon|Gennadiy Smirnov
title: Kokoko
